name: require-xml
description: require('require-xml') lets you load XML files using require syntax. For example: var config = require('./config.xml');
readme:
See [better-require](https://github.com/olalonde/better-require).

# Install

    npm install require-xml

# Usage 

    require('require-xml');
    var data = require('./config.xml');

# Reference

http://nodejs.org/api/all.html#all_require_extensions
